home_info_1: I first embarked on the path as a self-taught developer, developing an e-commerce application for a local firm in Vietnam.
home_info_2: I moved to the United States to pursue software engineering at Worcester Polytechnic Institute.
home_info_3: I journeyed to the tech hubs of Hangzhou, China to investigate high-technology recruitment and development.
home_info_4: I completed a software engineering contract at NVIDIA.
contact_message_placeholder: Let me know how I can be of service!
about_bio: I'm a dedicated and detail-focused software engineer with 5 years of hands-on experience in full-stack web development, systems software engineering, and technical internships. With a strong foundation in languages like Java, Python, C, and C++, I love tackling web development challenges and system-level challenges. From creating sleek user interfaces to optimizing back-end performance, I enjoy building efficient and user-friendly software solutions.
about_exp_company_1_desc_1: Integrated host-side C++ tooling support and enhanced display driver firmware for DRIVE Thor SoC, enabling safety-critical automotive applications with improved error detection and compliance with functional safety standards.
about_exp_company_1_desc_2: Developed React-based GUI components to visualize tool input/output, streamlining validation workflows, and contributed to toolchain documentation to accelerate adoption across partner teams.
about_exp_company_2_desc_1: Designed and implemented an interactive hiring trends dashboard with real-time data visualization, optimizing performance and responsiveness across devices.
about_exp_company_2_desc_2: Built automated data pipelines and integrated REST APIs to enhance data accuracy and relevance, while developing reusable TypeScript chart components to streamline future development.
about_exp_company_3_desc_1: Led migration from WordPress to React, improving performance, streamlining workflows, and integrating solar mapping APIs to enhance quote accuracy.
about_exp_company_3_desc_2: Developed dynamic cost estimation tools, automated data synchronization, and authored migration guidelines to accelerate development and improve user experience.
about_exp_company_4_desc_1: Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform with Laravel and React, integrating role-based authentication, payment processing, and automated inventory syncing.
about_exp_company_4_desc_2: Built a dynamic CMS for product management, optimized API reliability with testing, and designed a responsive UI for seamless user experience.
project_1_desc: An immersive 3D portfolio website featuring interactive animations, dynamic lighting, and multilingual support.
project_2_desc: Annual hackathon event hosted by WPI sponsored by industry leads like MathWorks and ACM.
project_3_desc: A personal interpretation of CD PROJEKT RED's Gwent card game from The Witcher 3, featuring strategic AI gameplay, advanced state management, and authentic game mechanics.
project_4_desc: E-commerce platform with a customizable content management system for inventory management.
